alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 12:48PM MDT until April 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. Winds gusting 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Judith Gap. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted by snow, poor visibility and strong northwest winds. There may be some slush on US-191 through Judith Gap by daybreak Wednesday. The cold, wet and windy weather will be hazardous for young livestock. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin as rain then change to snow by late evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
